long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mail Mate is a handy Chrome extension that shows you unread messages and help keep you updated on your email activity at a glance. Say goodbye to missed messages with this intuitive unread message tracker. It displays a real-time count of your unread emails directly in your Chrome browser, ensuring you never overlook important messages again.
